title: 5-23-16 Michelle Bartholomew, Casey York, and Nancy Mahoney join Pat Sloan on American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
I spotted Michelle's work when she was featured on a project called 52 quilters. I love her story, her quilts and her great photography! Michelle is going to tell me about the 52 quilter project and share some photo taking tips with me today, I'm pretty excited!

www.michellebartholomew.com/ .
----------------
It's a joy to have Casey York back to talk applique! It's one of my favorite subjects. Casey is like me, we love the freedom of making shapes. She has new book that gives you several methods of applique and it's full of great designs to try them out on!
http://www.casey-york.com/ . 
-------------------
The very talented Nancy Mahoney is back to chat paper piece, quilt styles, expanding your color palette, and more with me today! Her book on paper piecing is full of great photo step outs, plus amazing quilts that take you from easy on up to greatness in paper piecing! She promise some insider tips for us today,
 http://www.nancymahoney.com/ .
----------
Pat Sloan http://www.patsloan.com
American patchwork & quilting http://www.allpeoplequilt.com
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
